member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.GetAsync``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a single entity by a single id from table "Ts" asynchronously using .NET 4.5 Task. T must be of interface type. Id must be marked with [Key] attribute. Created entity is tracked/intercepted for changes and used by the Update() extension.
member.typeparam: Interface type to create and populate
member.param: Open SqlConnection
Id of the entity to get, must be marked with [Key] attribute
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.GetAllAsync``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a list of entites from table "Ts". Id of T must be marked with [Key] attribute. Entities created from interfaces are tracked/intercepted for changes and used by the Update() extension for optimal performance.
member.typeparam: Interface or type to create and populate
member.param: Open SqlConnection
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.InsertAsync``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32},ISqlAdapter)
member.summary: Inserts an entity into table "Ts" asynchronously using .NET 4.5 Task and returns identity id.
member.param: Open SqlConnection
Entity to insert
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout
The specific ISqlAdapter to use, auto-detected based on connection if null

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.UpdateAsync``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Updates entity in table "Ts" asynchronously using .NET 4.5 Task, checks if the entity is modified if the entity is tracked by the Get() extension.
member.param: Open SqlConnection
Entity to be updated
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout
member.returns: true if updated, false if not found or not modified (tracked entities)

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.DeleteAsync``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Delete entity in table "Ts" asynchronously using .NET 4.5 Task.
member.param: Open SqlConnection
Entity to delete
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout
member.returns: true if deleted, false if not found

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.DeleteAllAsync``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Delete all entities in the table related to the type T asynchronously using .NET 4.5 Task.
member.param: Open SqlConnection
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout
member.returns: true if deleted, false if none found

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.Get``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a single entity by a single id from table "Ts". Id must be marked with [Key] attribute. Entities created from interfaces are tracked/intercepted for changes and used by the Update() extension for optimal performance.
member.typeparam: Interface or type to create and populate
member.param: Open SqlConnection
Id of the entity to get, must be marked with [Key] attribute
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.GetAll``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a list of entites from table "Ts". Id of T must be marked with [Key] attribute. Entities created from interfaces are tracked/intercepted for changes and used by the Update() extension for optimal performance.
member.typeparam: Interface or type to create and populate
member.param: Open SqlConnection
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout

member.name: F:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.TableNameMapper
member.summary: Specify a custom table name mapper based on the POCO type name

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.Insert``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Inserts an entity into table "Ts" and returns identity id or number if inserted rows if inserting a list.
member.param: Open SqlConnection
Entity to insert, can be list of entities
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout
member.returns: Identity of inserted entity, or number of inserted rows if inserting a list

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.Update``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Updates entity in table "Ts", checks if the entity is modified if the entity is tracked by the Get() extension.
member.param: Open SqlConnection
Entity to be updated
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout
member.returns: true if updated, false if not found or not modified (tracked entities)

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.Delete``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: Open SqlConnection
Entity to delete
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout
member.returns: true if deleted, false if not found

member.name: M:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.DeleteAll``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Delete all entities in the table related to the type T.
member.param: Open SqlConnection
The transaction to run under, null (the default) if none
Number of seconds before command execution timeout
member.returns: true if deleted, false if none found

member.name: F:Dapper.Contrib.Extensions.SqlMapperExtensions.GetDatabaseType
member.summary: Specifies a custom callback that detects the database type instead of relying on the default strategy (the name of the connection type object). Please note that this callback is global and will be used by all the calls that require a database specific adapter.
